It seems like a simple question, but geologists, geographers, and historians are divided in their opinions. Let's count: Europe, Asia, Africa, and Austral… [+4747 chars]

articles.title: NASA Internship Programs - NASA
articles.description: NASA offers paid internships that provide an opportunity for high school and college-level students to contribute to agency projects.
